name: createWordFrequencyCounter
description: Create a function that counts the frequency of each word in a string
pyTest:
def test_word_frequency(self):
        self.assertEqual(word_frequency("hello world hello"), {"hello": 2, "world": 1})
        self.assertEqual(word_frequency("the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog"), 
            {"the": 2, "quick": 1, "brown": 1, "fox": 1, "jumps": 1, "over": 1, "lazy": 1, "dog": 1})
        self.assertEqual(word_frequency(""), {})
